entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 1:21 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
